keyMoments.title: Heart Pirates Discuss New World Entry
keyMoments.description: The Heart Pirates are shown near Sabaody Archipelago discussing their plans to enter the New World after the events at Marineford.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's progression and preparation for the New World.

keyMoments.title: Drake Pirates Challenge Kaido's Forces
keyMoments.description: X Drake and his crew arrive at a winter island controlled by Kaido and deliberately provoke the guardian Scotch.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Drake's strategic plan to infiltrate Kaido's organization.

keyMoments.title: On Air Pirates Battle Giant Boars
keyMoments.description: Apoo and his crew encounter and battle enormous wild boars on a New World island.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the challenges rookie pirates face in the New World.

keyMoments.title: Running on Invisible Air
keyMoments.description: The crew discovers they can run on invisible pathways in the air while fleeing from giant boars.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases the bizarre phenomena of New World islands.

keyMoments.title: Blackbeard Pirates Defeat Bonney Pirates
keyMoments.description: The Blackbeard Pirates have defeated Jewelry Bonney and her crew, planning to exchange her with the Marines.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the Blackbeard Pirates' growing power after Marineford.

keyMoments.title: Blackbeard Pirates Flee from Akainu
keyMoments.description: When Admiral Akainu arrives, the Blackbeard Pirates immediately retreat, abandoning Bonney.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew is not yet ready to challenge Marine Admirals despite their increased power.

keyMoments.title: Bonney Pirates Defeated
keyMoments.description: The Bonney Pirates are defeated by the Blackbeard Pirates and subsequently captured by the Marines.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the power gap between Supernovas and Yonko-level threats.

statusHistory.reason: Defeated by Blackbeard Pirates and captured by Marines
